name: Tata Neu Infinity HDFC Bank Credit Card

network.note: Available in both Visa and RuPay variants. RuPay variant enables UPI linkage for rewards on UPI transactions

joining.waiverCondition: Limited period Lifetime Free offer for applications between Oct 1, 2024 - Dec 31, 2024
joining.note: Welcome benefit of 1,499 NeuCoins effectively compensates the joining fee

renewalWaiver.waiverText: Spend ₹3,00,000 or more in a year before credit card renewal date for fee waiver

addOnCard.note: Add-on cards available; contact bank for specific fees

latePayment.calculation: Tiered based on Total Amount Due
latePayment.note: GST applicable on late payment charges

existingRelationship.note: No existing HDFC Bank relationship required

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, and overall credit profile
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history and consistent card usage

gracePeriod.note: Interest-free period of up to 50 days from transaction date if previous balance paid in full

minPayment.calculation: 5% of total outstanding or ₹200, whichever is higher

cashAdvance.note: 2.5% of amount withdrawn or ₹500, whichever is higher. Interest charged from day 1

rewards.earningText: Earn 1.5% back as NeuCoins on all non-Tata brand spends

exclusions.educationExclusion: Education payments through third-party apps (CRED, Cheq, MobiKwik, etc.) do not earn NeuCoins. Direct payments to schools/colleges earn NeuCoins.
exclusions.note: Transactions at excluded MCCs do not earn NeuCoins

upi.note: Total NeuCoins on all UPI payments capped at 500/month

expiry.condition: From end of the month in which NeuCoins are credited
expiry.example: NeuCoins credited on August 5, 2025 valid until August 31, 2026
expiry.promotionalExpiry: Promotional NeuCoins follow terms communicated at issuance

welcome.description: 1,499 NeuCoins as reversal of 1st year membership fee on first transaction within 30 days of card issuance
welcome.exclusion: Not applicable for Lifetime Free or First Year Free cards

tataNeuAndPartners.calculation: 1.5% base + 3.5% additional on partner TATA Brands
tataNeuAndPartners.condition: Non-EMI spends only. EMI spends earn 1.5%
tataNeuAndPartners.note: 5% back as NeuCoins on non-EMI spends on Tata Neu and partner brands

neuPassBonus.eligibleCategories: Selected categories on Tata Neu App/Website
neuPassBonus.requirement: Must download Tata Neu App and register for NeuPass
neuPassBonus.restriction: Only for transactions via Primary Card Holder Mobile Number Account
neuPassBonus.note: Additional 5% NeuCoins on selected categories via NeuPass membership

nonTataBrands.note: 1.5% back as NeuCoins on all non-Tata brand spends and merchant EMI spends

upi.additionalCondition: UPI payments via Tata Neu UPI ID
upi.variant: RuPay only for card-on-UPI; Tata Neu UPI ID bonus available to all
upi.note: 0.5% on UPI spends + additional 1% via Tata Neu UPI ID, capped at 500 NeuCoins/month total

groceries.note: Capped at 2,000 NeuCoins per month effective Jan 1, 2023

insurance.note: 5% on insurance paid via Tata Neu app

gaming.note: No NeuCoins on online skill-based gaming (MCC 5816)

bankPortal.note: Tata Neu cards do not participate in SmartBuy accelerated rewards

partnerMerchants.note: 5% on partner Tata brands, up to 10% with NeuPass

redemption.bestOption: Direct redemption on Tata Neu app/website

options.description: Redeem for purchases on Tata Neu app/website across partner brands
options.howTo: Select Tata Pay/NeuCoins/Loyalty Redemption as payment method at checkout
options.note: NeuCoins with closest expiry used first. Some brands like Air India, Tata Play, Bill Payment not available for redemption

options.description: Redeem at select partner brand stores
Purchase gift cards on Tata Neu app
options.note: Can get 7-8% effective discount on gift cards when combined with promotions

exclusions: Bill Payment on Tata Neu (no NeuCoin redemption)

transferPartners.note: NeuCoins cannot be transferred to airline or hotel loyalty programs

pooling.note: NeuCoins are linked to Tata Neu account, not poolable across HDFC cards

specialLogic.rounding: NeuCoins calculated and posted as nearest round down integer (e.g., 3.3 NeuCoins = 3 NeuCoins)
specialLogic.creditTiming: NeuCoins transferred to Tata Neu within 7 working days of statement generation
specialLogic.statementBreakdown: Monthly statement shows breakup of NeuCoins earned

spendRequired.note: Spend ₹50,000 or more in a calendar quarter to qualify for 2 lounge vouchers

accessFee.note: ₹2 charged to card for lounge access (nominal verification charge)

domestic.checkStatus: Login to HDFC Bank NetBanking/Mobile app > Credit Card Section > Redeem Reward Points > MyReward > Spend Promo Details

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for international lounge access

visa.priorityPassNote: W.e.f June 1, 2025, Priority Pass issued only on request. Apply through HDFC Bank portal if new/renewed/replacement card issued
visa.domesticUsage: Charges apply if Priority Pass used in India

accessFee.note: Transaction fee charged and reversed for complimentary visits

dining.note: No standalone dining program; earn 5% NeuCoins at Tata brands like Qmin

fuel.gstNote: GST on fuel surcharge is non-refundable
fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver, max ₹500 per statement cycle. No NeuCoins earned on fuel

forex.markupText: 2% foreign currency markup on international transactions

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency

forex.crossCurrencyNote: 3.5% foreign currency transaction fee on transaction value
forex.note: One of the lower forex markups in segment; 2% FCY markup + 3.5% transaction fee applies

noCostEMI.note: No-cost EMI on select merchants and products

emi.note: EMI spends on Tata brands earn 1.5% NeuCoins instead of 5%

processingFee.note: 1% of transferred amount or ₹250, whichever is higher + taxes

hotelPerks.note: Earn 5% NeuCoins at IHCL (Taj) Hotels; redeem NeuCoins for stays

airAccident.condition: Accidental air death; bodily injury resulting in death within 12 months of air accident

emergencyOverseasHospitalization.condition: Emergency overseas hospitalization due to bodily injury or sudden unexpected sickness during international travel

lostCardLiability.condition: Zero liability on fraudulent transactions if reported immediately to 24-hour call centre

insurance.claimProcess: Submit documents to HDFC ERGO within 130 days from date of loss
insurance.note: Insurance coverage: ₹1 Cr air accident, ₹15 Lakh emergency hospitalization, ₹9 Lakh lost card liability

contactless.note: Contactless payments up to ₹5,000 without PIN

upiLinkage.note: RuPay variant can be linked to UPI apps for card-on-UPI transactions

upgradesTo.note: Based on overall relationship and spend patterns

upgradePathway.note: Upgrade eligibility based on spend history and relationship with HDFC Bank

customerService.tataNeuSupport: Via Tata Neu App for NeuCoin related queries

meta.bestFor: Frequent Tata ecosystem shoppers (BigBasket, Croma, Westside, Taj Hotels) who want up to 10% rewards on Tata brands and 1.5% on other spends, with lounge access benefits
meta.notRecommendedFor: Those who don't shop regularly on Tata platforms, fuel-heavy spenders, or those seeking airline miles transfers
meta.verdict: The Tata Neu Infinity HDFC Bank Credit Card is one of the best co-branded shopping cards in India for Tata ecosystem users. With up to 10% NeuCoins (5% base + 5% NeuPass) on Tata brands and 1.5% on other spends, it offers excellent value for regular shoppers. The RuPay variant uniquely offers rewards on UPI transactions (1.5% capped at 500/month), making it versatile for daily payments. The 2% forex markup is competitive in this segment. However, the recent changes making lounge access milestone-based (₹50K quarterly spend) and various caps on utility/grocery/insurance categories reduce its appeal for casual users. Best suited for those who can consistently spend within the Tata ecosystem and meet lounge qualification thresholds.
pros: Up to 10% rewards on Tata Neu and partner brands
1.5% rewards on all other eligible spends
RuPay variant earns up to 1.5% on UPI transactions
Low 2% forex markup compared to peers
Welcome benefit of 1,499 NeuCoins covers joining fee
Strong insurance coverage (₹1 Cr air accident, ₹15 Lakh hospitalization)
Annual fee waiver on ₹3 Lakh spend
cons: Domestic lounge access now requires ₹50K quarterly spend (effective June 2025)
Multiple category caps (grocery, utility, insurance, telecom at 2,000/month each)
No rewards on fuel, rent, wallet loads, gaming
NeuPass bonus excludes several Tata brands (Tanishq, Air India, Tata Play, Cult.fit)
Education payments via third-party apps excluded
Priority Pass now request-based for Visa variant
Limited redemption options outside Tata ecosystem

alternatives.reason: 5% cashback on all online spends without brand restrictions
Better for travel with reward point transfers to airlines/hotels
5% cashback on bill payments and Google Pay transactions
Lower fee alternative with 7% max rewards on Tata brands

dataSource: Official HDFC Bank website - Product page
Tata Neu Infinity Terms & Conditions PDF

changelog.change: NeuCoins validity changed to 12 months from month of credit
Insurance NeuCoin cap changed from 2,000/day to 2,000/month; Online gaming excluded
Domestic lounge access changed to milestone-based (₹50K quarterly spend required)
Priority Pass for Visa variant now issued only on request
NeuPass bonus restricted to Primary Card Holder Mobile Number Account transactions
Lifetime Free offer launched for applications between Oct-Dec 2024
Utility and Telecom/Cable NeuCoins capped at 2,000/month each
UPI rewards introduced - 0.5% base + 1% via Tata Neu UPI ID, capped at 500/month
